resources.string: Agora vote is a voting \n platform where users can create elections and invite friends to cast their votes.
It supports a wide range of voting algorithms some of which are Majority, Egalitarian, Australian STV just to name a few
Feel free to contact us on out gitter channels and work with us on gitlab

Elections for college students 
 to decide the best project out of 
 the selected ones.

1. Mukul Kumar 
2. Abandon 
3. Thuvarakan 
4. Alex Stark
